description:
A "page" component, this is defined as a wrapper around the contents (NeonGrid, etc) and footer which provides the
correct responsive layout accounting for NeonTopNav and NeonSideNav components being used.

props.name: pageAlign
props.description: Page alignment: either left aligned or center aligned.

slots.name: top-nav
slots.description: The NeonTopNav slot. This slot is required to ensure the correct responsive page layout.

slots.name: side-nav
slots.description: The NeonSideNav slot. This slot is required to ensure the correct responsive page layout.

slots.name: footer
slots.description: The NeonFooter slot. This slot is required to ensure the correct responsive page layout.
